case.name: Bullet strip B: bouncing bullet
case.description: Aimee strips by firing a bullet which ricochets around the room and rips apart either her cowboy outfit, her armbands, or her footwear.

case.name: Bullet strip G: breasts
case.description: Aimee strips by firing a bullet which ricochets and rips apart her skirt and tube top, revealing her breasts

case.name: Bullet strip I: cum
case.description: Aimee cums a little due to firing a bullet which grazed her legs as it shredded her panties

case.name: Bullet strip A: first shot
case.description: Aimee aims her gun and fires. The other characters have not yet seen that she intends to shoot off her clothing.

case.name: Bullet strip C: clothing in shreds
case.description: Aimee's outfit falls to the ground in shreds

case.name: Bullet strip D: shooting again
case.description: Aimee fires her gun each time she wants to strip. You can target each stage individually if you want to sequence your responses

case.name: Bullet strip E: close call
case.description: Aimee accidentally shot off her neck accessory when shooting off her armbands, which was more than she intended!

case.name: Bullet strip F: waiting for the bullet
case.description: Aimee shot a bullet high up and is waiting for it to return to shoot her top off

case.name: Bullet strip H: final bouncing bullet
case.description: A bullet ricochets around as Aimee waits for it to shoot off her panties

case.name: Aimee finished
case.description: Aimee let off a stray shot as she was climaxing, and it hit her in the arm

notes.note: This case was hidden due to no longer making sense after changes were made to the targeted character. If you're rewriting this character, feel free to delete it.

markers.marker: Aimee has 48 Specialties. What are they? Who knows.
Aimee bullies silent characters, pretending they said slutty things.
Aimee offers to tell the player a joke if they throw their hand in round 6.
Aimee laughs at the player if they lose in round 6.
